ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only items
ygData.msgSnippet: Have a sense of adventure and discover it yourself  = ) Or if you paid attention to the web-board on my site it has the complete info and has done for a few
ygData.messageBody:
Have a sense of adventure and discover it yourself = )

Or if you paid attention to the web-board on my site it has the complete
info and has done for a few days.

- Baelish


----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel Devorkin <devo@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 3:13 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only items


> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> okay, we have gone through what this item is, but how do you start the
> quest? what continent? who do you talk to? etc....
>
> -Aeramus
>
